DOC.detailed_description: The propose project aim improve process make evidence-informed treatment decision patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) ultimately empower patient self-management . Current RA treatment emphasize : 1 ) need early aggressive treatment , 2 ) use treat-to-target approach . However , patient often struggle treatment decision , especially option benefit risk . To address challenge , investigator base Arthritis Research Canada previously develop online decision aid call ANSWER-2 ( ANimated , Self-serve , WEb-based , Research Tool : Version 2 ) RA patient consider biologic , tool recently adapt US healthcare setting ( call US-ANSWER-2 ) . Objectives : 1 ) To evaluate effectiveness US-ANSWER-2 reduce patient ' decisional conflict . 2 ) To assess extent US-ANSWER-2 improves patient ' knowledge RA medication confidence manage health . 3 ) To examine experience patient rheumatologist use US-ANSWER-2 . The investigator conduct proof-of-concept randomized control trial 80 patient RA . Eligible individual : 1 ) diagnosis RA rheumatologist , 2 ) whose rheumatologist recommend initiate biologic switch another biologic , 3 ) internet access email . The Intervention Group receive simple instruction access US-ANSWER-2 decision aid complete program within two day . At end session , one-page summary produce help discuss question , concern , preferred choice health care provider . The Control Group receive standard online medication guide , reflective usual practice . Participants complete Decisional Conflict Scale ( primary outcome ) intervention ( US-ANSWER-2 standard online medication guide ) . The following secondary outcome measure collect baseline , Month 1 , Month 2 : 1 ) Medication Education Impact Questionnaire , 2 ) Partners Health Scale . In addition , use healthcare resource collect baseline Month 2 , use biologics collect Month 6 . All participant rheumatologist invite participate qualitative interview experience patient decision aid .
